Name: Mystery Metal
Des: Use Baru Ore to create Mystery Metal for Refine, which can refine weapons, helmets, and clothes to enhance their performance.

recipeVariants.Name: Mystery Metal - Novice
recipeVariants.Des: Use Baru Ore to create Mystery Metal for Refine, which can refine weapons, helmets, and clothes to enhance their performance.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.1
SpecialAward.Des: 5% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.2
SpecialAward.Des: 10% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.3
SpecialAward.Des: 15% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

materials.Name: Baru Ore
materials.Description: Can be converted into Mystery Metal for refining gear parts after Forging .
materials.Description2: A basic ore with a black shiny luster. It has a relatively hard texture, a slightly rough surface, and irregular patterns.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Baru Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Low-grade Baru ore is commonly found within the Towering Ruin. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Baru Ore, which is used to craft Mystery Metals.

materials.Name: Burning Powder
materials.Description: A material that needs to be added during Forging .
materials.Description2: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Burning Powder*15
lifeSkillSource.Des: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

SpecialAward.Name: Artisanry Lv.1
SpecialAward.Des: Gain 2 extra items when crafting Burning Powder or Gem Wax.

SpecialAward.Name: Artisanry Lv.2
SpecialAward.Des: Gain 5 extra items when crafting Burning Powder or Gem Wax. Gain 1 extra item when crafting Fast-Burning Powder.

materials.Name: Charcoal
materials.Description: Wood-fired products, primarily used as building materials.
materials.Description2: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!

lifeSkillSource.Name: Charcoal*10
lifeSkillSource.Des: Though seemingly simple, the kiln process demands precision, especially in sealing!

materials.Name: Pine Timber
materials.Description: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
materials.Description2: Available exclusively through merchants from alternative regions, as pine timber is protected in Asteria Plains.

recipeVariants.Name: Mystery Metal - Master
recipeVariants.Des: Producing Mystery Metal with Baru Rich Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of weapons, helmets, and garments.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.1
SpecialAward.Des: 5% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.2
SpecialAward.Des: 10% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

SpecialAward.Name: Lucky Smelting Lv.3
SpecialAward.Des: 15% chance to gain an extra item when producing Mystery Metal, Radiant Stone, and Fine Forgestone.

materials.Name: Baru Rich Ore
materials.Description: Can be converted into a larger amount of Mystery Metal for refining gear parts after Forging .
materials.Description2:
A basic ore with a black shiny luster. It has a relatively hard texture, a slightly rough surface, and irregular patterns.
Rich ores usually appear in clusters, containing much more mineral content than ordinary ores, but are less abundant and naturally more expensive.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Baru Rich Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Intermediate-grade Baru ore is commonly found in the core module sector. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Baru Rich Ore, which is used to craft Mystery Metals.

materials.Name: Burning Powder
materials.Description: A material that needs to be added during Forging .
materials.Description2: With its skill to significantly elevate temperature, this carbon powder ensures deeper and more efficient processing during smelting.

SpecialAward.Name: Artisanry Lv.2

recipeVariants.Name: Mystery Metal- Pro
recipeVariants.Des: Producing Mystery Metal with Baru Pure Ore yields <style="accent-gn">higher expected output</style> compared to standard ore. It serves as a vital material for gear refinement, enhancing the performance of weapons, helmets, and garments.

materials.Name: Baru Rich Ore
materials.Description: Can be converted into an even larger amount of Mystery Metal for refining gear parts after Forging .
materials.Description2:
A basic ore with a black shiny luster. It has a relatively hard texture, a slightly rough surface, and irregular patterns.
High-precision ores usually appear in areas with high Engram concentration, with some refined ores showing crystallization, containing much more mineral content than ordinary ores, and are very rare.

lifeSkillSource.Name: Baru Pure Ore
lifeSkillSource.Des: Rich Baru ore is commonly found along the Thunder Cliff Trail. While focused on gathering, you may harvest Baru pure ore, which is used to craft Mystery Metals.
